title: Cheney fought Democrats over Iraq before joining them against Trump
shortDescription: Dick Cheney was on the other side of the fence from Democrats when advocating for the Iraq war but he partnered with them opposing Trump after Jan. 6.

title: New law puts familiar drinks, creams and gummies in legal limbo
shortDescription: The new hemp rules close a loophole that allowed hemp-derived products containing THC to be sold.

title: Trump says he knows nothing about Epstein emails
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters on Air Force One that he knows "nothing" about new public Jeffrey Epstein emails, which mention him.

title: Trump hints at decision on whether to attack Venezuela
shortDescription: "I can’t tell you what it would be, but I’ve sort of made up my mind," Trump told reporters on Air Force One on Nov. 14.

title: What was it like to work in the East Wing? Ex-White House aides remember
shortDescription: USA TODAY asked several White House aides who worked at the East Wing in various administrations what the now-vanished historic space meant to them.

title: Bravo's Dr. Heavenly wins TV fights. Can she win bid for Congress?
shortDescription: Bravo's "Married to Medicine" breakout star Dr. Heavenly Kimes is known for her shade and strategy. Can she transfer the skills to her U.S. House bid?

title: 'Wacky.' Trump blasts former ally MTG with a new nickname
shortDescription: "All I see 'Wacky' Marjorie do is COMPLAIN, COMPLAIN, COMPLAIN!" Trump wrote on social media in announcing he is rescinding his endorsement.

title: Trump on latest Jeffrey Epstein email: 'I know nothing about that'
shortDescription: Trump also said he hasn’t thought about pardoning Ghislaine Maxwell, the Epstein associate in prison on charges related to sex trafficking.

title: Indiana Senate won't meet to redistrict, stopping Trump's push in its tracks
shortDescription: Senate President Pro Tempore Rodric Bray announced the chamber won't reconvene in December, due to a lack of support for redistricting.

title: Epstein email said Bill Clinton 'NEVER EVER' went to his island
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has again claimed that former President Bill Clinton was at Jeffrey Epstein's private island. Here is what his emails say.

title: Trump exempts beef, coffee, bananas and others from tariffs
shortDescription: The White House announced that Trump signed an executive order exempting certain agriculture products from reciprocal tariffs he imposed April 2.

title: White House construction seen from D.C. monument
shortDescription: Video captured from the Washington Monument spotted construction crew working to prepare the location for the White House’s new ballroom.

title: Epstein email describes sex encounters. Was Trump aware?
shortDescription: In a newly released email, Epstein provided lurid details of sexual encounters and claimed 'Trump knew.'

title: Paul Ingrassia has new Trump administration job after racist texts
shortDescription: Paul Ingrassia, Trump's former pick to lead the Office of Special Counsel who withdrew over racist texts, has a new job in the administration.

title: Epstein worried about testifying to Congress – and wearing a tie
shortDescription: With a federal indictment looming, Jeffrey Epstein's team worried that Congress could call him to testify. Epstein asked if he'd 'have to wear a tie?'

title: Trump demands Epstein probe into democrats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called on the Justice Department and FBI to probe Democrats linked to Jeffrey Epstein in Truth Social posts.

title: What interventions in Latin America say about Trump’s Venezuela gambit
shortDescription: The U.S. has a long and checkered history of intervening in Latin America. Here's what that may tell us about President Trump's ideas for Venezuela.

title: Trump's Georgia election racketeering case gets new prosecutor
shortDescription: A new prosecutor has been named in the Georgia election racketeering case against Trump and others, after the disqualification of Fani Willis.

title: Trump calls on DOJ to probe Democrats tied to Epstein
shortDescription: Trump's call came after House Democrats released emails in which Epstein, a convicted sex offender, alleged the president "knew about the girls."
